select c_rno , class_review.clno as "clno" , class_review.mno as "mno" , class.cl_name , content , to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "create_date" , cl_img , case when star <= 5 and star > 4 then '★★★★★' when star <= 4 and star > 3 then '★★★★☆' when star <= 3 and star > 2 then '★★★☆☆' when star <= 2 and star > 1 then '★★☆☆☆' when star <= 1 then '★☆☆☆☆' end as star from class_review join class on (class_review.clno = class.clno) where class_review.mno = #{mno} order by c_rno desc

select cs_qno , cs.mno , gb_no , refer_no , cs.title , content , to_char(create_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "create_date" , filepath , cs.status , answer_content , to_char(answer_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "answer_date" , cl_name as "cl_name" from cs_qna cs join class c on ( cs.refer_no = c.clno) where cs.cs_qno = #{csQno} and gb_no = 1 and cs.status = 'Y' and cl_status = 'Y' order by cs_qno desc

select rno , title , content , img1 , review_date , case when star_rating <= 5 and star_rating > 4 then '★★★★★' when star_rating <= 4 and star_rating > 3 then '★★★★☆' when star_rating <= 3 and star_rating > 2 then '★★★☆☆' when star_rating <= 2 and star_rating > 1 then '★★☆☆☆' when star_rating <= 1 then '★☆☆☆☆' end as star_rating from s_review r join store s using(pno) where r.mno = 5 and r.status = 'Y' and s.status = 'Y' order by review_date desc
